resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106078</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106078</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208175</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Guitars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Guitarren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guitares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guitarras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guitars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κιθάρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guitarras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The guitar is a very versatile instrument that is popular in many different styles of music. It comes in several varieties that have important similarities, although they can sound very different.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Guitarre ist ein sehr vielseitiges begabt 
Instrument, das in vielen unterschiedlichen Arten von Musik populär 
ist. Sie kommt in einige Vielzahl, die wichtige Ähnlichkeiten 
haben, obgleich sie sehr unterschiedlich klingen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La guitare est un instrument très souple qui est 
populaire dans beaucoup de différents modèles de la musique. 
Elle vient dans plusieurs variétés qui ont des similitudes 
importantes, bien qu'elles puissent sembler très différentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A guitarra é um instrumento muito versátil que 
seja popular em muitos estilos diferentes da música. Vem em 
diversas variedades que têm similaridades importantes, embora possam 
soar muito diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il guitar è uno strumento molto versatile che è 
popolare in molti stili differenti di musica. Viene in parecchie
varietà che hanno somiglianze importanti, anche se possono suonare 
molto differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κιθάρα είναι ένα πολύ ευπροσάρμοστο όργανο που 
είναι δημοφιλές σε πολλές διαφορετικές μορφές της μουσικής. 
_ αυτός έρχομαι διάφορος ποικιλία που έχω σημαντικός 
ομοιότητα, αν και αυτός μπορώ ηχώ πολύ διαφορετικός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La guitarra es un instrumento muy versátil que es
popular en muchos diversos estilos de la música. Viene en 
varias variedades que tengan semejanzas importantes, aunque pueden 
sonar muy diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208175</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106078</entry>
